item.title: Add Custom Fonts like Operator Mono to Intellij IDEA in Windows
item.description: Even if your have monospace fonts like Operator Mono is installed in your Windows machine, it will not be listed in Settings. In this article I will show how you can add monospace fonts which are not listed in Intellij IDEA settings. Table of contents  First option: install fonts in Administrator mode Second option: copy the fonts to IDEA’s font directory In conclusion References: First option: install fonts in Administrator mode FYI: This option does not work in all cases.
